content.html:
Thanks for the review, it's very informative. The good surprise for me is that the heat management seems well born and that the autonomy is very decent given the size of the device.

Did you have any time to try a live USB with some Linux flavor?

Thanks for the review, it's very informative. The good surprise for me is that the heat management seems well born and that the autonomy is very decent given the size of the device.
